original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebraAbsorbStable. intros worlds R1A R1B JA JB R2A R2B SAabsA SAabsB m m1 m2 Hjoin. specialize (SAabsA m m1 m2 Hjoin) as [n1 [n2 [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]. exists n1, n2. repeat split; auto. intros worlds R1 J R2 Hstrong m m1 m2 Hjoin. apply DownwardsClosure_SAAbsorbStable with (worlds:=worlds) (J := J) (R2 := R2). auto. apply Hstrong.
